input_text:
Job Title: AWS Solution Architect

Location: South San Francisco, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Health Care Provider, Other, Strategy/Planning

Description:
AWS Solution/Data Architect:South San Francisco, CA - Hybrid


Description:● Work closely with AI strategist and analysts to understand their immediate and long term needs● Define the end-to-end architecture to leverage data assets from multiple data lakes● Understand the global/enterprise architecture and define solutions that comply with global standards● Represent local business groups in the global architecture forum● Has in depth knowledge in the business area that he/she is assigned to. For example Finance● Understands cross functional business processes and facilitates implementation of cross functional IT solutions● Can influence business partners at the Director and Program Manager levels.● Has general and in-depth knowledge in AWS services, AWS architecture and Machine learning● Has successfully delivered on multiple projects in the past using established technology standards as well as emerging ones.● Understand complex problems/information and create models/pictures representing their essential components and relationships.● Correlate problems/issues at hand with problems/issues/solutions from different domains.● Defines criteria of success for initiative and ALL stakeholders –business, management, team, function● Makes recommendations based on benefits, risks, urgency, etc.● Proactively tracks progress and addresses any gaps in direction or communication
Requirements:● Good understanding of Cloud computing and Big data concepts (MUST have)● Good knowledge of AWS services like EC2, S3, Lambda, Glue, athena, Kinesis datastreams, Kinesis Firehose, etc● Good understanding of SageMaker, CRISP-DM model etc● Good knowledge ETL & Data Warehousing concepts with hands-on experience (MUST have)● Good understanding of SQL, Redshift, Python , SPARK and JSON● Knowledge of API-based integration and security (SOAP and RestFul) - Mulesoft preferred● Good understanding of database concepts, modeling, knowledge of SQL. MySQL, Oracle is a plus● Good understanding of system and data integration from several systems● Setting up IAM Roles, Policies etc.● Strong Analytical skills● Ability to learn fast and translate data into actionable results● Excellent verbal and Written communication skills● Ability to follow and document technical processes

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: AWS Solution Architect
output_json.summary: AWS Solution/Data Architect: South San Francisco, CA - Hybrid
required_skills: Good understanding of Cloud computing and Big data concepts
Good knowledge of AWS services like EC2, S3, Lambda, Glue, athena, Kinesis datastreams, Kinesis Firehose
Good understanding of SageMaker, CRISP-DM model
Good knowledge ETL & Data Warehousing concepts with hands-on experience
Good understanding of SQL, Redshift, Python, SPARK and JSON
Knowledge of API-based integration and security (SOAP and RestFul) - Mulesoft preferred
Good understanding of database concepts, modeling, knowledge of SQL. MySQL, Oracle is a plus
Good understanding of system and data integration from several systems
Setting up IAM Roles, Policies etc.
Ability to learn fast and translate data into actionable results
Excellent verbal and Written communication skills
Ability to follow and document technical processes
soft_skills: Ability to learn fast and translate data into actionable results
Excellent verbal and Written communication skills
Ability to follow and document technical processes
job_responsibilities: Work closely with AI strategist and analysts to understand their immediate and long term needs
Define the end-to-end architecture to leverage data assets from multiple data lakes
Understand the global/enterprise architecture and define solutions that comply with global standards
Represent local business groups in the global architecture forum
Has in depth knowledge in the business area that he/she is assigned to
Understands cross functional business processes and facilitates implementation of cross functional IT solutions
Can influence business partners at the Director and Program Manager levels
Has general and in-depth knowledge in AWS services, AWS architecture and Machine learning
Has successfully delivered on multiple projects in the past using established technology standards as well as emerging ones
Understand complex problems/information and create models/pictures representing their essential components and relationships
Correlate problems/issues at hand with problems/issues/solutions from different domains
Defines criteria of success for initiative and ALL stakeholders –business, management, team, function
Makes recommendations based on benefits, risks, urgency, etc
Proactively tracks progress and addresses any gaps in direction or communication

other.content:
● Work closely with AI strategist and analysts to understand their immediate and long term needs
● Define the end-to-end architecture to leverage data assets from multiple data lakes
● Understand the global/enterprise architecture and define solutions that comply with global standards
● Represent local business groups in the global architecture forum
● Has in depth knowledge in the business area that he/she is assigned to. For example Finance
● Understands cross functional business processes and facilitates implementation of cross functional IT solutions
● Can influence business partners at the Director and Program Manager levels.
● Has general and in-depth knowledge in AWS services, AWS architecture and Machine learning
● Has successfully delivered on multiple projects in the past using established technology standards as well as emerging ones.
● Understand complex problems/information and create models/pictures representing their essential components and relationships.
● Correlate problems/issues at hand with problems/issues/solutions from different domains.
● Defines criteria of success for initiative and ALL stakeholders –business, management, team, function
● Makes recommendations based on benefits, risks, urgency, etc.
● Proactively tracks progress and addresses any gaps in direction or communication
